text: Elena Maria del Rocio Padrones Nieto (born May 2, 1973 in Valladolid) is a cyclist from Spain. She has a disability: She is blind. She competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. She finished third in the tandem road race. == References == Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Valladolid
